home_text:
Are you a star wars fan? Do you know all the characters?
Then indentify as many characters as you can in 2 minutes!
score_0: Is it you, Jar Jar Binks?
score_2: I feel the Force to wake up in you!
score_3: You still need to train, little Padawan.
score_4: Woh, we got a Jedi here.
score_5: The force is strong in you.
score_6: Do you do anything else in life besides watching star wars?
name: Name
